WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="95c199e8fe2f4c9b90db830cf98cbc2a" Scale="0.9929907"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Veremos suas habilidades Dandori em ação.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="1031c9153ccb4fbb9012837f0bb7ef6d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Demonstre sua destreza.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="61d32e58d2e74041a359a5403d775c3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hum... Que comece o treino!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9dbda1a7f71d4784a62e3e3207303822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Sua recompensa será... [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin brancos[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="29446c679fac466aa81b24c31d6f4160" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Dedique-se e receberá [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikmin roxos[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GoodProgress_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2c9924cdfef644408b04ca68ee206064" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah, que desempenho notável.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GoodProgress_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d4b7ef1f8c6d462189dbe480ac0a236a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Suas habilidades Dandori são incríveis!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_LastOneMin_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="a8619b74eaba44a09ba00225b17aa10b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Seu tempo está chegando ao fim...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0bd15f8189d4633a158e491645840cc" Scale="0.9626274"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Delegar tarefas é a base da prática Dandori!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="862b6af7c84e4adab3fa04a531c7451f" Scale="0.9529148"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Priorizar tarefas é essencial na arte Dandori!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="00072fc1aabc4c85ba3f6d1ffdc18008" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Lembre-se de consultar o mapa!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9418fca028c340f7abca48e2b8646b97" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Dedique-se ao seu treino!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="87ddf11a271f4e9fb3e96af5b0b7fe43" Scale="0.9781358"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hum... Lembro de mim ao lhe ver praticando.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_05: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="129f46d82163496188fc7c20ab4c5bf5" Scale="0.9444444"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Não há tempo para distrações. Concentre-se!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d59c8f4191f4a7fadd2e8951fae0ac7" Scale="0.9179265"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]O sábio uso de itens faz parte da arte Dandori!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d0bbe671f7fa40b89d49b27d53306d89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hum... Itens existem para serem usados.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5df7c7ce8fee48998a23a16952b867c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hã?! Você se descuidou...
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Talvez [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] possa lhe reanimar...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0a09588ae784b1f8c3ff619f60cb1ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Mais cautela da próxima vez.
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Por ora, peça a [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] para lhe reanimar!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d88d8d47330f46cc9081acdcd9878c20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] parece ter desmaiado.
[Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Reanime-o o mais rápido possível!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c4de0f4569ca4023b718d473fe8abdc4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Você levou [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] ao limite!
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Agora é sua responsabilidade ajudá-lo.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2794b9da60af4bb1a04b7b664ccc77ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Você ficou sem Pikmin!
[Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Talvez seja melhor [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]reiniciar [System:Color name="Default"]o desafio...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="65c9357bbe2241aaa783425d168fb415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Parece que você não tem mais Pikmin...
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Tem a intenção continuar mesmo assim?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6b22f861c7d74afda96499ed8bee73c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Transporte com muito cuidado!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b324701301664a1a97236f8fb0156c55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Colete a matéria-prima!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="580d6ed478e74995be306b0b6cc1da94" Scale="0.9340659"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Para abrir a porta, é preciso coletar tesouros!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b93f13ddf6e0474da767fa8a5072c13d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hum... Como essa porta pode ser aberta?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c18dd1b6eed6437ca0904031a502a880" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hum... Colete [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]três tesouros[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c7d3da0d24464560b9290edfa60177f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]E as criaturas também contam!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="89938bc354e540f0ac62f095a5289afd" Scale="0.9572072"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Escolha bem o momento de fazer a mudança.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="faae8f9ffa2a4ba9aeb39e75557486dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Não é necessário transportar suas presas.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5a33c29b23f54de79662d604bf5bd636" Scale="0.9330406"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A ordem em que são derrotadas é importante.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6e60b3173bb1496aad9e4a52451ef024" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Não permita que seus Pikmin se congelem.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="0fc7a445af654f0ea65a816a018bbd60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah, faça bom uso destas brasas.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="e991fffa01c349819c9ba1cde61ac873" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Utilize a ajuda dos Pikmin sabiamente!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="4066162773a8402eaa1a7b61b0d2e360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Evitar conflitos desnecessários é crucial!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="50989d5f220d4145b657169aa6685ad0" Scale="0.9279476"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Pikmin alados reduzem o tempo de transporte.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2680d6b5f0b84d62981ebf2b8c679f34" Scale="0.9169363"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Use o vaporizador superpicante com sapiência.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8f6f6f599ac24871b1c1939da3a270be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Pikmin alados têm acesso a atalhos...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="15b8983b2a174f5086a535b78c22846e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Use trampomelos para economizar tempo!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="abc31d6d11544d8b83fe89a366365701" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Observe o mecanismo[System:Color name="Default"] atentamente.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d06678d734244fa94576280d6b958b1" Scale="0.9100642"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Será que você pode desbloquear o mecanismo?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="7577445c285c4901b8709dfbed905f6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hum... Pulgões-lacera. Que incovenientes!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="720820c61d3a4dd99d7e5c7e73b6925d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Oriente [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] com cautela!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="092d4489ae4e4f178aabc66e6bdb3106" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Dividir suas tarefas com [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] é vital!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="180ed5e232774a938c4909b107c79366" Scale="0.9648127"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Branco e roxo são cores de grande utilidade.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8fa75746e95b40b28dd97806d618731e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Que criaturas enfadonhas, não é?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="49cf1ab9310c42d2a0cb4f620f4a2b9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Use os Pikmin roxos estrategicamente.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b2ba5f0c83064fe59ecc9c271b5e28e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Decida [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]o que não precisa ser feito[System:Color name="Default"] agora!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b85112bcb603459b855e5ba5931888e6" Scale="0.9090909"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]A sua colaboração com [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] é imprescindível!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5516eed58e2b4ad18215219f4e4ba518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] está agitado...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f3cd2bfd2c6f492eaa770a62f6dfc9a8" Scale="0.9860789"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Ah, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Otchin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Você não pode transportar isso.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Pikmin_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="be5aac63cab14a1e98d54c192ff5f7a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Lidere seus Pikmin adequadamente!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6cc170a01af4464ab42a99aac330bf98" Scale="0.9781358"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Você se perdeu? Quais são os seus planos?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="44e7826a190c4ef3b109aec23011bd78" Scale="0.9497207"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hum. Você não consegue carregar isso daqui.
